name: a left-leaning but high-quality polling outlet

content.html: Today @DataProgress launched our Corporate Pride Accountability Project, tracking the political donations of dozens of corporate Pride sponsors simultaneously funding anti-LGBTQ+ legislation like “Don’t Say Gay” bills across the country. dataforprogress.org/accountable-al…
